SA10n1068:4: yo nāsti, nāsau saha kārikāraṇabhāvena pratipadyate,
SA10n1068:8: iha bījāvanisalilajvalanapavanagaganābhidhānahetupratyayasāmagrīṃ pratītya ayamaṅkura upajāyamānaḥ satyāmapi bījādipratyayasāmagryām,
SA10n1068:14: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām ||iti ||
SA10n1068:23: iha bījādihetupratyayasāmagrīto'ṅkurādiphalodaye parikalpyamāne vyavasthitasya vā phalasya sāmagryāṃ satyāṃtata utpādaḥ parikalpyeta avyavasthitasya vā?
SA10n1068:27: hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryā jāyate yadi |
SA10n1068:28: phalamasti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham ||1 ||
SA10n1068:32: na hi kuṇḍe dadhi vidyamānaṃ kuṇḍena janyate |
SA10n1068:35: abhivyaktiḥ sthaulyaṃ vā sūkṣmātmanā vidyamānasya kriyata iti cet,
SA10n1068:41: hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryā jāyate yadi |
SA10n1068:42: phalaṃ nāsti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham ||2 ||
SA10n1068:43: yadi hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryāṃ nāsti tatphalam,
SA10n1068:47: phalaṃ nāsti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham |
SA10n1068:51: gṛhyeta nanu sāmagryāṃ sāmagryāṃ ca na gṛhyate ||3 ||
SA10n1068:55: yacca yatra nāsti na tattatra gṛhyate tadyathā sikatāsu tailam,
SA10n1068:57: atha syāt - vidyamānā api padārthāḥ atisaukṣmyāt,
SA10n1068:64: paramāṇuvat akṣasthāñjanaśalākāvat ādityagativat taimirikaikaikakeśavat andhabadhirādirūpaśabdādivat kuḍayādivyavahitaghaṭādivat siddhadevapiśācādiśarīravat viṣayāntaravyāpṛtasya viṣayāntaravanna gṛhyate iti cet,
SA10n1068:70: yad rūpīndriyagrāhyaṃ tad ebhiḥ kāraṇairvidyamānamapi sanna gṛhyate,
SA10n1068:73: kiṃ tarhi sāmānyenaiva yad brūmaḥ - gṛhyeta nanu sāmagryāmiti ||
SA10n1068:82: asmādapyanumānādastitvamasya ayuktamiti kṛtvā nāstyeva sāmagryāṃ phalamiti kiṃ na gṛhyate?
SA10n1068:83: athāpi syāt - ubhyorapi pakṣayoranumānavirodhād yathā astitvaṃ na yuktam,
SA10n1068:94: tadevaṃ na sāmagrītaḥ phalamutpadyate vidyamānasya grahaṇaprasaṅgāt,
SA10n1068:96: atha manyase - nāstyeva sāmagryāṃ phalamiti, evamapi -
SA10n1068:97: hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryāṃ nāsti cetphalam |
SA10n1068:99: yathā hi jvālāṅgārādiṣu aṅkuro nāstīti kṛtvā tasya te hetupratyayā na bhavanti,
SA10n1068:100: eva vivakṣitānāmapi bījādīnāṃ hetupratyayatā na syāt teṣu aṅkuro nāstīti kṛtvā |
SA10n1068:101: na ca ahetu pratyayebhyaḥ phalapravṛttiryukteti nāsti svabhāvataḥ phalapravṛttiḥ ||
SA10n1068:102: atrāha - naiva hi sāmagryāḥ phalotpādanasāmarthyamasti yataḥ iyaṃ cintā syāt - kiṃ sāmagryāṃ phalamasti utāho nāstīti |
SA10n1068:105: sa hetuḥ phalasyotpattyarthaṃ hetuṃ datvā nirudhyate,
SA10n1068:106: tena ca hetunā anugṛhyamāṇaṃ phalamutpadyate iti |
SA10n1068:109: na cāpyajātasya bandhyātanayasyeva kenacitkiṃcinmātraṃ kartuṃ śakyamityayuktaiṣā kalpanā ||4 ||
SA10n1068:113: yadi hetuḥ phalasyotpattyarthaṃ hetukaṃ kāraṇaṃ datvā nirudhyata iti parikalpyate,
SA10n1068:114: evaṃ sati yaddattaṃ yanniruddhaṃ ca tadātmabhāvadvayaṃ hetoḥ syāt |
SA10n1068:117: atha hetorātmabhāvadvayaprasaṅgaparihārārthaṃ sarvātmanā nirodha iṣyate phalasyotpattyarthaṃ kiṃcidapyadatvā, evamapi -
SA10n1068:121: nanu tasmin hetau niruddhe yatphalamutpadyate tat āhetukaṃ syāt |
SA10n1068:124: atrāha - yadi evaṃ phalasya hetorutpattau doṣaḥ,
SA10n1068:125: evaṃ sati sahotpannaiva sāmagrī phalasya janikā astu,
SA10n1068:133: atrāhureke - naiva hi abhūtvā bhāvānāmutpattiryuktā ākasmikatvaprasaṅgāt |
SA10n1068:134: tasmād hetupratyayasāmagrītaḥ pūrvameva tat phalamanāgatāvasthāyāṃ vyavasthitamanāgatātmanā |
SA10n1068:140: yadi bhavatāmabhīpsitaṃ sāmagrītaḥ pūrvameva phalaṃ svarūpataḥ syāditi,
SA10n1068:146: anye punarvarṇayanti - hetureva phalaṃ janayati na sāmagrī |
SA10n1068:148: yasmāt na hi anyohetuḥ anyat phalam |
SA10n1068:149: yataḥ, kiṃ hetuṃ datvā phalasya heturnirudhyate uta adatvaiveti vicāraḥ syāt |
SA10n1068:150: api tu hetureva niruddhaḥ phalātmanā vyavasthitaḥ iti |
SA10n1068:152: niruddhe cetphalaṃ hetau hetoḥ saṃkramaṇaṃ bhavet |
SA10n1068:157: naṭasya veṣāntaraparityāgena veṣāntarasaṃcāravat hetoḥ saṃkramaṇa mātrameva syāt,
SA10n1068:164: kiṃ ca | etasyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ pūrvajātasya ca hetoḥ punarjanma prāpnoti |
SA10n1068:165: na ca jātasya punarapi [janma] yujyate niṣprayojanatvāt,
SA10n1068:167: atha manyase - yenātmanā vidyamāno na tenaivātmanā jāyate,
SA10n1068:168: yena cātmanā avidyamānaḥ tenaiva jāyata iti |
SA10n1068:170: aparityaktahetusvabhāvasya hetusvarūpasya phalamiti saṃjñāmātrabhedādavasthābhedācca dravyābhedasya sādhayitumaśakyatvāt |
SA10n1068:171: phalāvasthāyāṃ ca parityaktahetusvabhāvasya phalaśabdavācyatvād hetuḥ phalātmanā tiṣṭhatīti yatkiṃcidetat ||9 ||
SA10n1068:172: kiṃ cānyat - yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet,
SA10n1068:178: [ yadi tāvata niruddhaḥ astaṃgataḥ hetuḥ utpannaṃ sat vidyamānaṃ phalaṃ janayatīti parikalpyate,
SA10n1068:181: kathaṃ niruddhaḥ asaṃvidyamānaḥ hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet?
SA10n1068:184: phalaṃ ca sad vidyamānamapi janmanirapekṣamapi kathaṃ heturjanayi ṣyati?
SA10n1068:186: kiṃ tu tiṣṭhanneva hetuḥ phalaṃ janayiṣyatīti |
SA10n1068:188: tiṣṭhannapi heturavikṛtarūpo vidyamānena phalena vṛtaḥ saṃbaddhaḥ kathaṃ janayet ? iha hi -
SA10n1068:190: iti kāraṇābhāvaṃ pratipadyamānasya hetoravaśyaṃ vikāreṇa bhavitavyam |
SA10n1068:195: atha manyase - vidyamānasya phalasya punarjanayitumaśakyatvāt avṛta eva asaṃbaddha eva hetuḥ phalena phalaṃ janayiṣyatīti,
SA10n1068:202: kiṃ cānyat | yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet,
SA10n1068:205: na hyadṛṣṭvā vā dṛṣṭvā vā heturjanayate phalam ||11 ||
SA10n1068:211: evaṃ tāvad hetuḥ phalaṃ dṛṣṭvā na janayati,
SA10n1068:214: atha kimidaṃ darśanaṃ kiṃ vā adarśanamiti? ucyate |
SA10n1068:216: nanu etad bījādiṣu nirindriyeṣu na saṃbhavati |
SA10n1068:219: tatra yaḥ utpādavādī brūyāt - dṛṣṭvā janayatīti,
SA10n1068:220: sa vaktavyaḥ - na dṛṣṭametalloke yadbījādikaṃ paśyatīti |
SA10n1068:226: aniṣṭāpattyā hi vayaṃ parakalpanāṃ vicārayāmaḥ saṃsārāṭavīkāntāragiridarīprapātaduḥkhamālāsamākulāmā tāmīva |
SA10n1068:227: buddhipūrvakartṛkaṃ ca puruṣādikāraṇino jagadabhyupagacchanto nirgranthāścaikendriyaṃ bījādikaṃ pratipannāḥ prasaṅgānna vyativartanta iti |
SA10n1068:229: kiṃ cānyat - yadi yuṣmadabhimataṃ hetoḥ phalasya ca anyonyaḍhaukanalakṣaṇaṃ saṃgamanaṃ syāt,
SA10n1068:231: yasmāt na hi parasparāsaṃgatayorālokāndhakārayoḥ saṃsāranirvāṇa yorjanyajanakabhāvo dṛṣṭa iti |
SA10n1068:232: ataḥ avaśyaṃ hetuphalabhāvayorjanyajanakabhāvamicchatā pareṇa saṃgati rabhyupeyā |
SA10n1068:233: sā ca kālatraye'pi vicāryamāṇā na saṃbhavati |
SA10n1068:238: atītasya tāvat phalasya atītena hetunā saha jātu kadācidapi saṃgatirnāsti,
SA10n1068:240: nāpi ajātena hetunā atītasya phalasya saṃgatirjātu vidyate,
SA10n1068:243: nāpi jātena vartamānena hetunā saha atītasya phalasya saṃgatiḥ saṃbhavati,
SA10n1068:245: naṣṭasya ca phalasya avidyamānatvādvandhyā putreṇeva devadattasyetyabhiprāyaḥ || 12 ||
SA10n1068:246: yathā ca atītasya phalasya atītena anāgatavartamānena hetunā saha na kadācit saṃgatirasti,
SA10n1068:247: evaṃ vartamānasyāpi phalasya traikālikena hetunā saha nāsti saṃgatiriti tat pratipādayannāha -
SA10n1068:248: na jātasya hyajātena phalasya saha hetunā |
SA10n1068:250: jātasya phalasya bhinnakālatvādajātena ca atītena ca hetunā saha saṃgamanaṃ nāsti |
SA10n1068:251: nāpi vartamānasya vartamānena hetunā saha saṃgatirasti,
SA10n1068:254: kiṃ hi vidyamānayoḥ parasparanirapekṣayoḥ punaḥ saṃgatyā prayojanamiti nāsti saṃgatiḥ ||13 ||
SA10n1068:255: idānīmanāgatasyāpi phalasya yathā atītānāgatapratyutpannena hetunā saha saṃgamanaṃ nāsti tathā pratipādayannāha -
SA10n1068:256: nājātasya hi jātena phalasya saha hetunā |
SA10n1068:259: tasya bhinnakālena vartamānena atītena ca hetunā saha nāsti saṃgamanaṃ bhinnakālatvāt |
SA10n1068:262: yadā caivaṃ sarvathā hetuphalayoḥ saṃgatirnāsti, tadā -
SA10n1068:263: asatyāṃ saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam |
SA10n1068:264: naiva hetuḥ phalaṃ janayati saṃgateravidyamānatvāt vandhyāputramivetyabhiprāyaḥ ||
SA10n1068:265: athāpi syāt - satyāmeva saṃgatau hetuḥ phalaṃ janayatīti,
SA10n1068:268: athāpi kathaṃcid hetuphalayoḥ saṃgatiḥ parikalpyate, evamapi -
SA10n1068:269: satyāṃ vā saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam ||15 ||
SA10n1068:275: yo'yaṃ phalasya hetuḥ phalasya janaka iṣyate,
SA10n1068:276: sa tena śūnyo vā bhavan phalamutpādayet, aśūnyo vā?
SA10n1068:277: tatra hetuḥ śūnyaḥ phalena rahitaḥ phalaṃ na janayati,
SA10n1068:279: phalena aśūnyo'pi hetuḥ phalaṃ na janayati,
SA10n1068:282: evaṃ tāvat phalaśūnyo vā phalāśūnyo vā hetuḥ phalaṃ na janayati ||16 ||
SA10n1068:289: tadevaṃvidhaṃ phalaṃ naivotpatsyate svabhāvasyānapāyitvācca na nirotsyate |
SA10n1068:302: na hi svabhāvena avidyamānasya ākāśādeḥ udayavyayau dṛṣṭau |
SA10n1068:304: kiṃ cānyat - yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet,
SA10n1068:308: hetoḥ phalasya caikatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate |
SA10n1068:309: hetoḥ phalasya cānyatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate ||19 ||
SA10n1068:313: yadi hetoḥ phalasya ca ekatvaṃ syāt,
SA10n1068:317: evaṃ tāvad hetoḥ phalasya ca ekatvaṃ nāsti ||
SA10n1068:320: yadi hetoḥ phalasya ca bhavanmatenābhimatamanyatvaṃ syāt,
SA10n1068:321: tadā paratra nirapekṣatvād hetunirapekṣameva phalaṃ syāt |
SA10n1068:323: ityataḥ anyatvamapi hetoḥ phalasya ca na saṃbhavati |
SA10n1068:327: kiṃ cānyat - yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet,
SA10n1068:328: sa tatphalaṃ svabhāvena sadbhūtaṃ vā janayet,
SA10n1068:333: tatra yat phalaṃ svabhāvena sadbhūtaṃ svabhāvena vidyamānam,
SA10n1068:345: sasvabhāvaśca na kaścit padārtho nāma astīti pratidvandvayabhāvāt niḥsvabhāvo'pi padārtho nāstīti kuto'naikāntikatā?
SA10n1068:346: na hi asmākaṃ pratibimbakaṃ sasvabhāvaṃ nāpi niḥsvabhāvam,
SA10n1068:348: na hi āryāḥ pratibimbakaṃ nāma kiṃcit niḥsvabhāvaṃ sasvabhāvaṃ vā upalabhanta iti ||
SA10n1068:349: tatra pūrvaṃ phalaṃ notpatsyate ityādinā ślokadvayena sākṣādutpattikriyākartṛtvaṃ phalasya niṣiddham |
SA10n1068:354: na ca asati phale hetorhetutvaṃ sidhyati,
SA10n1068:359: atha syāt - yadyapi evaṃ hetorhetutvaṃ nāsti,
SA10n1068:361: na ca hetumantareṇa phalaṃ yuktamiti phalasadbhāvād heturapi bhaviṣyatīti |
SA10n1068:366: atrāha - naiva hi kevalasya hetoḥ phalotpattikriyāyāḥ prayojakatvam,
SA10n1068:367: kiṃ tarhi hetupratyayasāmagryā phalaṃ janyate iti |
SA10n1068:370: api ca, iyaṃ hetupratyayasāmagrī yadi phalasya janiketi kalpyate,
SA10n1068:371: kiṃ sāsvayameva tāvadātmānaṃ janayati, utāho na ?
SA10n1068:374: na hi alabdhātmabhāvasya prayojakatvaṃ dṛṣṭamityataḥ sāmagryā avaśyaṃ labdhātmabhāvayā bhavitavyam |
SA10n1068:375: na ca labdhātmabhāvāyāḥ punaḥ svātmotpāde prayojakatvaṃ yuktam,
SA10n1068:380: yā sāmagrī janayate sā kathaṃ janayetphalam |23 ||
SA10n1068:381: pratyayānāṃ hetūnāṃ ca yeyaṃ sāmagrī sā tāvadātmanaiva ātmānaṃ notpādayati,
SA10n1068:386: na hi bandhyāduhitā ātmānaṃ janayitumaśaktā satī putraṃ janayiṣyatīti yujyate |
SA10n1068:387: evaṃ sāmagryapi svātmājanikā phalaṃ janayatīti na yujyate ||23 ||
SA10n1068:390: athāpi syāt- yadi sāmagrīkṛtaṃ phalaṃ na saṃbhavati,
SA10n1068:391: evaṃ tarhi asāmagrīkṛtaṃ bhaviṣyatīti cet, ucyate -
SA10n1068:396: atha syāt - yadyapi nāsti phalaṃ svabhāvataḥ,
SA10n1068:398: na ca phalamantareṇa hetupratyayasāmagrī saṃbhavatīti phalamapi saṃbhaviṣyatīti |
SA10n1068:402: yadā tu yathoditena nyāyena phalameva nāsti, tadā -
SA10n1068:403: asti pratyayasāmagrī kuta eva phalaṃ vinā ||24 ||
SA10n1068:404: phalābhāve sati nirhetukā hetupratyayasāmagrī api nāstītyabhiprāyaḥ |
SA10n1068:432: tena hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhena na rūpe sthātavyaṃ na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne sthātavyam |
SA10n1068:433: na srotaāpattiphale na sakṛdāgāmiphale na anāgāmiphale na arhattve na pratyekabuddhatve na samyaksaṃbuddhatve sthātavyam ||iti ||
